DOC.brief_summary: Alliance Control Diabetes 2.5-year study fund American Academy Family Physicians Foundation . The study design help patient well manage diabetes , partnership Institute Behavioral Community Health Clínicas de Salud del Pueblo , Inc ( CDSDP ) , private , non-profit corporation provide comprehensive primary care service resident throughout Imperial Riverside Counties , California . The investigator identify 336 patient uncontrolled diabetes three CDSDP clinic . Patients randomly assign intervention control condition . The 12-month intervention consist individual diabetes management support deliver trained volunteer peer supporter . The primary aim determine peer support help patient well manage diabetes improve quality life . Intervention effectiveness evaluate volunteer patient survey baseline , 6 month 12 month . This study part global Peers Progress network test peer support program 13 country .
DOC.criteria: Must least 18 year old Must diagnose Diabetes Mellitus Type I , Diabetes Mellitus Type II Gestational Diabetes Must resident Imperial County Must current patient Clínicas de Salud del Pueblo , Inc. , one three participate clinic Must speak Spanish and/or English Must plan remain Imperial County least 12 month enrollment study Must involve diabetesrelated study
